query:
SELECT r.id, r.customerId, r.amount, r.paymentMethod, r.status, r.transactionId, r.createdAt, r.completedAt, c.pin, c.email 
FROM recharges r 
JOIN customers c ON r.customerId = c.id 
WHERE c.pin = 7 
ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT r.id, r.customerId, r.amount, r.paymentMethod, r.status, r.transactionId, r.createdAt, r.completedAt, c.pin, c.email 
FROM recharges r 
JOIN customers c ON r.customerId = c.id 
WHERE c.pin = 7 
ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC
